S1 + S2 -> S3 + S4 @ k1 * S1 * S2 * compartment
S3 + S4 -> S1 + S2 @ k2 * S3 * S4 * compartment

Initial conditions:
Amount of S1            1.0 10^-3    mole
Amount of S2            1.0 10^-3    mole
Amount of S3            2.0 10^-3    mole
Amount of S4            1.0 10^-3    mole
Parameter k1            0.75 10^3    litre mole^-1 s^-1
Parameter k2            0.25 10^3    litre mole^-1 s^-1
Volume of compartment   1.0          litre
